purposeDescriptions.low: partially mitigates a physical attribute for target creature (sense of smell, sharp claws, etc), granting a weakened version of the same attribute to another creature that is physically contacting the caster
purposeDescriptions.mid: partially mitigates a physical attribute for target creature (sense of smell, sharp claws, etc), granting the same attribute to another creature that is physically contacting the caster
purposeDescriptions.high: completely mitigates a physical attribute for target creature (sense of smell, sharp claws, etc), granting a greatly enhanced version of the same attribute to another creature that is physically contacting the caster
